name: TI_2_1_2_9_User_Permissions__Authorization__Security_Audit_Trigger
title: TI.2.1.2.9 User Permissions (Authorization) Security Audit Trigger (Function)
description: Manage Audit Trigger initiated to track user permissions (authorization).
purpose: Capture user permissions (authorization), both routine and exceptional, including key metadata (who, what, when, where, why).

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.9#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence when user permissions (authorizations) are granted, removed or updated.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.9#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.9#03
statement.requirement: IF known, THEN the system SHALL capture identity of the user.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.9#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.9#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.9#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time of the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.9#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the location (i.e., network address).

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.9#08
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture the rationale for granting, removing or updating user permissions.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.9#09
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of user to whom permissions apply.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.9#10
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the new set of applicable user permissions (authorizations).
